notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: L.Z. and P.L. conceived and designed the experiments; X.D., J.M., H.X., L.Y. and X.W. performed the experiments; X.D. and L.Z. analyzed the data; L.C., F.M. and Q.Z. contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools; X.D., J.M. and L.Z wrote and revised the paper.
